summary: On Anna's birthday, Elsa and Kristoff are determined to give her the best celebration ever, but Elsa's icy powers may put more than just the party at risk.
cast: Kristen Bell|Idina Menzel|Jonathan Groff|Josh Gad|Santino Fontana|Chris Williams|Paul Briggs|Grace Capeless|Ava DeMary|Alexa Shae Niziak|Bailey Ryon
title: Frozen Fever
